title.en: Supplication to Lord Buddha together with the Sixteen Arhats

text.en: Lord of the ten strengths, victorious Ādityabandhu,1
text.en-trans: tob chü wangchuk gyalwa nyimé nyen

text.en: Together with your entourage of regents, the Arhats,
text.en-trans: gyaltsab pakpé neten khor ché kyi

text.en: May theamṛta-light of your blessings radiate throughout the world,
So that the lotus of well-being and happiness forever blooms.
